sampleDataset.description: Create synthetic data based on the publicly available dataset predicting opting in or out of bank marketing.
Create believable song lyrics using this dataset of Taylor Swift hits.
Use this sample electronic health records (EHR) dataset to synthesize an entirely new set of statistically equivalent records.

Use this dataset to predict if a driver will file an insurance claim in the following year. Specify an output size in the config. By default, the model will create as many records as the input dataset.
Create synthetic data based on the publicly available dataset predicting opting in or out of bank marketing.

Unstructured text datasets are useful for training chatbots or other models that need large amounts of data. The emails in this public dataset need to be de-identified before they can be used to train ML models.
This public dataset of bicycle sales provides a good example of commonly found sensitive data in sales records. Use it to quickly label names, emails, social security numbers, etc.
